hadith1.title: عند الاستيقاظ | Upon Waking
hadith1.summary: Beautiful supplication taught by Imam Zayn al-Abidin for beginning each day

steps.arabic: قَالَ أَبُو عَبْدِ اَللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ اَلسَّلاَمُ
steps.transliteration: Qāla Abū 'Abdi llāhi 'alayhi s-salām
steps.translation: Abu Abdullah (Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him) said:

steps.arabic: إِنَّ عَلِيَّ بْنَ اَلْحُسَيْنِ صَلَوَاتُ اَللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ
steps.transliteration: Inna 'Aliyya bna l-Ḥusayni ṣalawātu llāhi 'alayh
steps.translation: "Verily, Ali ibn al-Husayn (prayers of Allah be upon him)

steps.arabic: كَانَ إِذَا أَصْبَحَ قَالَ
steps.transliteration: Kāna idhā aṣbaḥa qāl
steps.translation: when morning came, would say:

steps.arabic: أَبْتَدِئُ يَوْمِي هَذَا
steps.transliteration: Abtadi'u yawmī hādhā
steps.translation: 'I begin this day

steps.arabic: بَيْنَ يَدَيْ نِسْيَانِي وَ عَجَلَتِي
steps.transliteration: Bayna yaday nisyānī wa 'ajalatī
steps.translation: in the face of my forgetfulness and haste,

steps.arabic: بِسْمِ اَللَّهِ وَ مَا شَاءَ اَللَّهُ
steps.transliteration: Bismi llāhi wa mā shā'a llāh
steps.translation: [with] "In the name of Allah, and what Allah wills."

steps.arabic: فَإِذَا فَعَلَ ذَلِكَ اَلْعَبْدُ
steps.transliteration: Fa-idhā fa'ala dhālika l-'abd
steps.translation: If a servant does this,

steps.arabic: أَجْزَأَهُ مِمَّا نَسِيَ فِي يَوْمِهِ
steps.transliteration: Ajza'ahu mimmā nasiya fī yawmih"
steps.translation: it suffices him for what he forgets during his day.'"

hadith2.title: دعاء الصباح | Morning Supplication
hadith2.summary: Powerful protection prayer taught by Imam Zayn al-Abidin for seeking divine shelter

steps.arabic: عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ السَّلَامُ قَالَ
steps.transliteration: ʿAn Abī ʿAbdillāhi ʿalayhi s-salāmu qāl
steps.translation: From Abu Abdullah (Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him), who said:

steps.arabic: كَانَ عَلِيُّ بْنُ اَلْحُسَيْنِ عَلَيْهِمَا اَلسَّلاَمُ يَقُولُ
steps.transliteration: Kāna ʿAliyyu bnu l-Ḥusayni ʿalayhimā s-salāmu yaqūl
steps.translation: "Ali ibn al-Husayn (peace be upon them both) used to say:

steps.arabic: مَا أُبَالِي إِذَا قُلْتُ هَذِهِ اَلْكَلِمَاتِ
steps.transliteration: Mā ubālī idhā qultu hādhihi l-kalimāt
steps.translation: 'I care not, when I utter these words,

steps.arabic: لَوِ اِجْتَمَعَ عَلَيَّ اَلْإِنْسُ وَ اَلْجِنُّ
steps.transliteration: Lawi jtamaʿa ʿalayya l-insu wa l-jinn
steps.translation: even if all humans and jinn were to gather against me:

steps.arabic: بِسْمِ اَللَّهِ وَ بِاللَّهِ
steps.transliteration: Bismi llāhi wa billāh
steps.translation: "In the name of Allah, and by Allah,

steps.arabic: وَمِنَ اَللَّهِ وَ إِلَى اَللَّهِ
steps.transliteration: Wa mina llāhi wa ilā llāh
steps.translation: and from Allah, and to Allah,

steps.arabic: وَفِي سَبِيلِ اَللَّهِ
steps.transliteration: Wa fī sabīli llāh
steps.translation: and in the path of Allah,

steps.arabic: وَعَلَى مِلَّةِ رَسُولِ اَللَّهِ
steps.transliteration: Wa ʿalā millati Rasūli llāh
steps.translation: and upon the creed of the Messenger of Allah,

steps.arabic: صَلَّى اَللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَ آلِهِ
steps.transliteration: Ṣallā llāhu ʿalayhi wa ālih
steps.translation: may Allah bless him and his family.

steps.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إِلَيْكَ أَسْلَمْتُ نَفْسِي
steps.transliteration: Allāhumma ilayka aslamtu nafsī
steps.translation: O Allah, to You I submit myself,

steps.arabic: وَ إِلَيْكَ وَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِي
steps.transliteration: Wa ilayka wajjahtu wajhī
steps.translation: to You I turn my face,

steps.arabic: وَ إِلَيْكَ أَلْجَأْتُ ظَهْرِي
steps.transliteration: Wa ilayka alja'tu ẓahrī
steps.translation: to You I entrust my back,

steps.arabic: وَ إِلَيْكَ فَوَّضْتُ أَمْرِي
steps.transliteration: Wa ilayka fawwaḍtu amrī
steps.translation: and to You I surrender my affairs.

steps.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ اِحْفَظْنِي بِحِفْظِ اَلْإِيمَانِ
steps.transliteration: Allāhumma ḥfaẓnī bi-ḥifẓi l-īmān
steps.translation: O Allah, protect me with the protection of faith

steps.arabic: مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيَّ وَ مِنْ خَلْفِي
steps.transliteration: Min bayni yadayya wa min khalfī
steps.translation: from before me and behind me,

steps.arabic: وَعَنْ يَمِينِي وَ عَنْ شِمَالِي
steps.transliteration: Wa ʿan yamīnī wa ʿan shimālī
steps.translation: from my right and my left,

steps.arabic: وَمِنْ فَوْقِي وَ مِنْ تَحْتِي
steps.transliteration: Wa min fawqī wa min taḥtī
steps.translation: from above me and below me,

steps.arabic: وَمِنْ قِبَلِي
steps.transliteration: Wa min qibalī
steps.translation: and from my front.

steps.arabic: وَ اِدْفَعْ عَنِّي بِحَوْلِكَ وَ قُوَّتِكَ
steps.transliteration: Wa dfaʿ ʿannī bi-ḥawlika wa quwwatik
steps.translation: And repel [harm] from me by Your power and strength,

steps.arabic: فَإِنَّهُ لاَ حَوْلَ وَ لاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِكَ
steps.transliteration: Fa-innahu lā ḥawla wa lā quwwata illā bik"'"
steps.translation: for there is no power nor strength except through You."'"

hadith1.title: وضوء | The Beautiful Way of Wudhu
hadith1.summary: Demonstration of proper wudhu technique starting with intention and praise of water's purity

steps.arabic: بَيْنَا أَمِيرُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ (عَلَيْهِ السَّلاَمُ) ذَاتَ يَوْمٍ جَالِساً مَعَ ابْنِ الْحَنَفِيَّةِ إِذْ قَالَ: يَا مُحَمَّدُ ائتِنِي بِإِنَاءٍ فِيهِ مَاءٌ أَتَوَضَّأْ لِلصَّلَاةِ
steps.transliteration: Baynā Amīr al-Mu'minīn ('alayhi s-salāmu) dhāta yawmin jālisan ma'a ibn al-Ḥanafiyyah idh qāl: Yā Muḥammad i'tinī bi-inā'in fīhi mā'un atawaḍḍa'u li ṣ-ṣalāh
steps.translation: While the Commander of the Faithful (peace be upon him) was sitting one day with Ibn al-Hanafiyyah, he said: 'O Muhammad, bring me a vessel with water so I may perform ablution for prayer.'

steps.arabic: فَأتَاهُ مُحَمَّدٌ بِالْمَاءِ فَأَكْفَأَ بِيَدِهِ الْيُمْنَى عَلَى يَدِهِ الْيُسْرَى ثُمَّ قَالَ: بِسْمِ الله الْحَمْدُ للهِ الَّذِي جَعَلَ الْمَاءَ طَهُوراً وَلَمْ يَجْعَلْهُ نَجِساً
steps.transliteration: Fa-atāhu Muḥammadun bil-mā'i fa-akfa'a biyadihi l-yumnā 'alā yadihi l-yusrā thumma qāl: Bismillāh, al-ḥamdu lillāhi l-ladhī ja'ala l-mā'a ṭahūran wa-lam yaj'alhu najisan
steps.translation: Muhammad brought him the water, and he poured his right hand over his left hand, then said: 'In the name of Allah. Praise be to Allah, Who made water purifying and not impure.'

steps.arabic: ثُمَّ تَمَضْمَضَ ثَلَاثاً وَاسْتَنْشَقَ ثَلَاثاً، وَقَالَ: اللَّهُمَّ لَقِّنِي حُجَّتِي يَوْمَ أَلْقَاكَ وَأَطْلِقْ لِسَانِي بِذِكْرِكَ
steps.transliteration: Thumma tamaḍmaḍa thalāthan wa-stanshaqaa thalāthan, wa-qāl: Allāhumma laqinnī ḥujjatī yawma alqāka wa-aṭliq lisānī bi-dhikrika
steps.translation: Then he rinsed his mouth three times and inhaled water into his nose three times, saying: 'O Allah, teach me my evidence on the day I meet You, and loosen my tongue with Your remembrance.'

steps.arabic: ثُمَّ غَسَلَ وَجْهَهُ ثَلَاثاً، وَقَالَ: اللَّهُمَّ بَيِّضْ وَجْهِي يَوْمَ تَسْوَدُّ فِيهِ الْوُجُوهُ، وَلَا تُسَوِّدْ وَجْهِي يَوْمَ تَبْيَضُّ فِيهِ الْوُجُوهُ
steps.transliteration: Thumma ghasala wajhahu thalāthan, wa-qāl: Allāhumma bayyiḍ wajhī yawma taswaddu fīhi l-wujūh, wa-lā tusawwid wajhī yawma tabyaḍḍu fīhi l-wujūh
steps.translation: Then he washed his face three times, saying: 'O Allah, whiten my face on the day when faces will be blackened, and do not blacken my face on the day when faces will be whitened.'

steps.arabic: ثُمَّ غَسَلَ يَدَهُ الْيُمْنَى ثَلَاثاً، وَقَالَ: اللَّهُمَّ أَعْطِنِي كِتَابِي بِيَمِينِي وَالْخُلْدَ فِي الْجِنَانِ بِيَسَارِي، وَحَاسِبْنِي حِسَاباً يَسِيراً
steps.transliteration: Thumma ghasala yadahu l-yumnā thalāthan, wa-qāl: Allāhumma a'ṭinī kitābī bi-yamīnī wa-l-khulda fī l-jināni bi-yasārī, wa-ḥāsibnī ḥisāban yasīrā
steps.translation: Then he washed his right arm three times, saying: 'O Allah, give me my book in my right hand and eternity in Paradise in my left hand, and reckon with me an easy reckoning.'

steps.arabic: ثُمَّ غَسَلَ يَدَهُ الْيُسْرَى ثَلَاثاً، وَقَالَ: اللَّهُمَّ لَا تُعْطِنِي كِتَابِي بِشِمَالِي وَلَا مِنْ وَرَاءِ ظَهْرِي، وَلَا تَجْعَلْهَا مَغْلُولَةً إِلَى عُنُقِي، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ مُقَطَّعَاتِ النِّيرَانِ
steps.transliteration: Thumma ghasala yadahu l-yusrā thalāthan, wa-qāl: Allāhumma lā tu'ṭinī kitābī bi-shimālī wa-lā min warā'i ẓahrī, wa-lā taj'alhā maghlūlatan ilā 'unuqī, wa-a'ūdhu bika min muqaṭṭa'āti n-nīrān
steps.translation: Then he washed his left arm three times, saying: 'O Allah, do not give me my book in my left hand, nor from behind my back, and do not make it chained to my neck. I seek refuge in You from the cutting portions of the Fire.'

steps.arabic: ثُمَّ مَسَحَ رَأْسَهُ، وَقَالَ: اللَّهُمَّ غَشِّنِي بِرَحْمَتِكَ وَبَرَكَاتِكَ وَعَفْوِكَ
steps.transliteration: Thumma masaḥa ra'sahu, wa-qāl: Allāhumma ghashshinī bi-raḥmatika wa-barakātika wa-'afwik
steps.translation: Then he wiped his head, saying: 'O Allah, cover me with Your mercy, Your blessings, and Your forgiveness.'

hadith2.title: وضوء | Wudhu Wisdom from the Prophet
hadith2.summary: Essential teachings on the spiritual significance of ablution rituals

steps.arabic: قال رسول الله ﷺ: إِذَا تَوَضَّأَ الْعَبْدُ الْمُؤْمِنُ فَمَضْمَضَ خَرَجَتِ الْخَطَايَا مِنْ فِيهِ
steps.transliteration: Qāla Rasūlu llāhi ﷺ: Idhā tawaḍḍa'a l-'abdu l-mu'minu fa-maḍmaḍa kharajati l-khaṭāyā min fīhi
steps.translation: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: 'When the believing servant performs ablution and rinses his mouth, the sins depart from his mouth.'

steps.arabic: فَإِذَا اسْتَنْثَرَ خَرَجَتِ الْخَطَايَا مِنْ أَنْفِهِ
steps.transliteration: Fa-idhā stanthara kharajati l-khaṭāyā min anfihi
steps.translation: When he clears his nose, the sins depart from his nose.

steps.arabic: فَإِذَا غَسَلَ وَجْهَهُ خَرَجَتِ الْخَطَايَا مِنْ وَجْهِهِ حَتَّى تَخْرُجَ مِنْ تَحْتِ أَشْفَارِ عَيْنَيْهِ
steps.transliteration: Fa-idhā ghasala wajhahu kharajati l-khaṭāyā min wajhihi ḥattā takhruja min taḥti ashfāri 'aynayhi
steps.translation: When he washes his face, the sins depart from his face, even from beneath his eyelashes.

steps.arabic: فَإِذَا غَسَلَ يَدَيْهِ خَرَجَتِ الْخَطَايَا مِنْ يَدَيْهِ حَتَّى تَخْرُجَ مِنْ تَحْتِ أَظْفَارِ يَدَيْهِ
steps.transliteration: Fa-idhā ghasala yadayhi kharajati l-khaṭāyā min yadayhi ḥattā takhruja min taḥti aẓfāri yadayhi
steps.translation: When he washes his hands, the sins depart from his hands, even from beneath his fingernails.

steps.arabic: فَإِذَا مَسَحَ بِرَأْسِهِ خَرَجَتِ الْخَطَايَا مِنْ رَأْسِهِ حَتَّى تَخْرُجَ مِنْ أُذُنَيْهِ
steps.transliteration: Fa-idhā masaḥa bi-ra'sihi kharajati l-khaṭāyā min ra'sihi ḥattā takhruja min udhnayhi
steps.translation: When he wipes his head, the sins depart from his head, even from his ears.

supplication1.title: الدعاء بالتوبة | Supplication on Confession
supplication1.summary: Heartfelt prayer acknowledging human imperfection and seeking divine mercy

steps.arabic: وَكَانَ مِنْ دُعَائِهِ عَلَيْهِ السَّلَامُ
steps.transliteration: Wa-kāna min du'ā'ihi 'alayhi s-salām
steps.translation: And among his prayers (upon him be peace)

steps.arabic: فِي الِاعْتِرَافِ وَطَلَبِ التَّوْبَةِ إِلَى اللَّهِ تَعَالَى
steps.transliteration: Fī l-i'tirāfi wa-ṭalabi t-tawbati ilā llāhi ta'ālā
steps.translation: in confession and seeking repentance from Allah, the Exalted:

steps.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّهُ يَحْجُبُنِي عَنْ مَسْأَلَتِكَ خِلَالٌ ثَلَاثٌ، وَتَحْدُونِي عَلَيْهَا خَلَّةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
steps.transliteration: Allāhumma innahu yaḥjubunī 'an mas'alatika khilālun thalāth, wa-taḥdūnī 'alayhā khallatun wāḥidah
steps.translation: O Allah, three traits prevent me from asking You, yet one trait compels me:

steps.arabic: يَحْجُبُنِي أَمْرٌ أَمَرْتَ بِهِ فَأَبْطَأْتُ عَنْهُ
steps.transliteration: Yaḥjubunī amrun amarta bihi fa-abṭa'tu 'anhu
steps.translation: What prevents me is a command You ordered, but I delayed in obeying;

steps.arabic: وَنَهْيٌ نَهَيْتَنِي عَنْهُ فَأَسْرَعْتُ إِلَيْهِ
steps.transliteration: Wa-nahyun nahaytanī 'anhu fa-asra'tu ilayhi
steps.translation: a prohibition You forbade, but I hastened toward it;

steps.arabic: وَنِعْمَةٌ أَنْعَمْتَ بِهَا عَلَيَّ فَقَصَّرْتُ فِي شُكْرِهَا
steps.transliteration: Wa-ni'matun an'amta bihā 'alayya fa-qaṣṣartu fī shukrihā
steps.translation: and a blessing You bestowed, but I fell short in gratitude.

steps.arabic: وَيَحْدُونِي عَلَى مَسْأَلَتِكَ تَفَضُّلُكَ عَلَى مَنْ أَقْبَلَ بِوَجْهِهِ إِلَيْكَ
steps.transliteration: Wa-yaḥdūnī 'alā mas'alatika tafaḍḍuluka 'alā man aqbala bi-wajhihi ilayka
steps.translation: What compels me is Your grace toward those who turn to You

steps.arabic: وَوَفَدَ بِحُسْنِ ظَنِّهِ إِلَيْكَ
steps.transliteration: Wa-wafada bi-ḥusni ẓannihi ilayka
steps.translation: and approach You with good hope.

steps.arabic: إِذْ جَمِيعُ إِحْسَانِكَ تَفَضُّلٌ
steps.transliteration: Idh jamī'u iḥsānika tafaḍḍul
steps.translation: For all Your benevolence is grace,

steps.arabic: وَإِذْ كُلُّ نِعَمِكَ ابْتِدَاءٌ
steps.transliteration: Wa-idh kullu ni'amika ibtidā'
steps.translation: and all Your favors are initiated by You alone.

steps.arabic: فَهَا أَنَا ذَا، يَا إِلَهِي وَاقِفٌ بِبَابِ عِزِّكَ وُقُوفَ المُسْتَسْلِمِ الذَّلِيلِ
steps.transliteration: Fa-hā anā dhā, yā ilāhī wāqifun bi-bābi 'izzika wuqūfa l-mustaslimi dh-dhalīl
steps.translation: Here I stand, my God, at the door of Your might--humbled and surrendered--

steps.arabic: وَسَائِلُكَ عَلَى الحَيَاءِ مِنِّي سُؤَالَ البَائِسِ المُعِيلِ
steps.transliteration: Wa-sā'iluka 'alā l-ḥayā'i minnī su'āla l-bā'isi l-mu'īl
steps.translation: asking You despite my shame, like a destitute beggar.
